cvpiaCalibration
  • Reference

Gaged Flow, Flow Coefficient of Variation, and Temperature

Measured daily and monthly mean flow (cfs) and temperature (°C) from USGS and CDEC gages for the duration of screw trap observations. The coefficient of variation (CV=sd/mean) for monthly flow was also calculated.

Format

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 216 rows and 3 columns.

Details

Available screw trap data start and end years:

Location start-end
RBDD 1999 - 2016
Feather River 1998 - 2016
Tuolumne River 2007 - 2017
American River 2013 - 2016
Battle Creek 1998 - 2016
Clear Creek 1998 - 2016
Deer Creek 1992 - 2010
Mokelumne River 1999 - 2015

Flow and Temperature Gage IDs

Flow Gages:

  • RBDD (Upper Sacramento River) - USGS SACRAMENTO R AB BEND BRIDGE NR RED BLUFF CA (11377100)

  • Feather River - CDEC FEATHER RIVER NEAR GRIDLEY (GRL)

  • Tuolumne River - USGS TUOLUMNE R A MODESTO CA (11290000)

  • American River - USGS AMERICAN R A FAIR OAKS CA (11446500)

  • Battle Creek - USGS BATTLE C BL COLEMAN FISH HATCHERY NR COTTONWOOD CA (11376550)

  • Clear Creek - CDEC CLEAR CREEK NEAR IGO (IGO)

  • Deer Creek - USGS DEER C NR VINA CA (11383500)

  • Mokelumne River - USGS MOKELUMNE R BL CAMANCHE DAM CA (11323500)

  • Stanislaus River - USGS STANISLAUS R A RIPON CA (11303000)

Temperature Gages:

  • RBDD (Upper Sacramento River) - CDEC SACRAMENTO R AT RED BLUFF DIVERSION DAM (RDB)

  • Feather River - CDEC FEATHER RIVER NEAR GRIDLEY (GRL)

  • Tuolumne River - USGS TUOLUMNE R A MODESTO CA (11290000)

  • American River - USGS AMERICAN R A FAIR OAKS CA (11446500)

  • Battle Creek - USGS BATTLE C BL COLEMAN FISH HATCHERY NR COTTONWOOD CA (11376550)

  • Clear Creek - CDEC CLEAR CREEK NEAR IGO (IGO)

  • Deer Creek - USGS DEER C NR VINA CA (11383500)

  • Mokelumne River - EDMUD provided data near Victor CA

  • Stanislaus River - USGS STANISLAUS R A RIPON CA (11303000)

NOTE: Deer Creek temperature data begins in 1998

Daily Data

Daily data for flow and temperature are also available: [watershed]_daily_flow or [watershed]_daily_temp
